name: Huntington Park
shortDescription: A historic city in the Gateway Cities region known for its strong community, cultural diversity, and affordable living.
fullDescription: Huntington Park is a vibrant urban community located southeast of downtown Los Angeles. Known for its rich Latino heritage, the city offers a variety of local businesses, parks, and community events that foster a close-knit atmosphere. With convenient access to major freeways and transit, Huntington Park serves as an affordable option for families and young professionals looking to live near the heart of Los Angeles County.
heroImageAlt: Street view of Huntington Park with colorful murals and local shops

neighborhoods.name: South Gate
neighborhoods.description: Neighboring city with a mix of residential and commercial areas and community parks.

neighborhoods.name: Bell
neighborhoods.description: Small city known for its working-class neighborhoods and local parks.

neighborhoods.name: Cudahy
neighborhoods.description: A compact city with affordable housing and community facilities.

neighborhoods.name: Vernon
neighborhoods.description: Industrial city with limited residential areas, close to Huntington Park.

highlights.title: Huntington Park Farmers Market
highlights.description: Weekly market featuring fresh produce, local vendors, and community activities.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Farmers market stalls with fresh fruits and vegetables

highlights.title: Central Park
highlights.description: Popular community park offering sports fields, playgrounds, and picnic areas.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Green park with trees and playground equipment

highlights.title: Local Murals and Art
highlights.description: Colorful street art celebrating the city's heritage and community spirit.

highlights.title: Huntington Park Community Center
highlights.description: Hub for classes, events, and local gatherings.

faqs.question: What is Huntington Park known for?
faqs.answer: Huntington Park is known for its strong Latino heritage, community events, and affordable housing options.

faqs.question: How is the real estate market in Huntington Park?
faqs.answer: The market offers affordable homes and condos compared to many parts of Los Angeles County.

faqs.question: What activities are popular in Huntington Park?
faqs.answer: Visiting the farmers market, enjoying Central Park, and appreciating local murals and events are popular.

faqs.question: How is commuting from Huntington Park?
faqs.answer: Huntington Park has convenient access to the 710 and 5 freeways and local bus transit options.
